Armada/Blizzard/Fascino/Twister/Wrath/Venomous/Quake



(The 7 walk in different directions, Armada looks around with Blizzard,
Fascino with Venomous, Twister with Quake, and Wrath with himself. Armada
and Blizzard see someone. They aim there rifles and each of them fire 2
shots at Demon Wulf.)


(Venomous and Fascino run at Shockwave, both fire 3 shots at him.)


(Twister slowly starts to approach Firestarter, she then stands there and
fires a shot at him, Quake follows Twister and fires 3 shots at
Firestarter.)


(Wrath runs along till he see's Dark Claw. He puts his rifle in it's holder
and pulls out a missile launcher. He fires 2 missiles at Dark Claw.)

OOC: I hope this post isn't screwy in any way.

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 07, 2001 5:22 PM
Subject: Re: 7 bots with nothing to do! (Hint hint!) (Sorry! I'll get them
occupied)


> The enemies are (I might miss some, but these are the ones that I can
> think of):
>
> Vehement, Sun Crusher, Reflector, Unitron, Firestarter, Injector,
> Bumblebee, Manterror, Shockwave, Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper, Dark Claw,
> Double Punch (invisible), Rampage, Tantrum, Surgital (gestalt),
> Abominus (gestalt).
>
>
